name: com.unity.xr.arkit
description:
Provides native Apple ARKit integration for use with Unity's multi-platform XR API.
Supports the following features:
-Efficient Background Rendering
-Horizontal Planes
-Depth Data
-Anchors
-Hit Testing
-Face Tracking
-Environment Probes
-Meshing
-Occlusion

upm.changelog: ### Changes,- Static library was built with Xcode 13.2.1 (13C100)
